events_data.title: Full Wedding Planning
events_data.short_description: Comprehensive wedding planning services from start to finish.
events_data.long_description: Our Full Wedding Planning package offers a stress-free and seamless wedding planning experience. We handle every aspect of your wedding, from the initial concept to the final farewell. Our team of experienced professionals will work closely with you to bring your dream wedding to life.

events_data.title: Wedding Photography
events_data.short_description: Capture the magic of your wedding day with professional photography.
events_data.long_description: Our Wedding Photography services are designed to capture every special moment of your big day. Our team of experienced photographers will work tirelessly to ensure that your wedding memories are preserved beautifully. From candid shots to posed portraits, we'll create a stunning visual record of your wedding that you'll treasure forever.
services_list: Pre-wedding consultation to understand your vision
Full-day coverage, from getting ready to the reception
Online gallery for easy sharing and downloading
Second photographer option for comprehensive coverage

events_data.title: Wedding Decor and Design
events_data.short_description: Transform your wedding venue with stunning decor and exquisite design.
events_data.long_description: Our Wedding Decor and Design service is all about creating a visually stunning and cohesive atmosphere for your wedding. We work closely with you to understand your style and preferences, and then we design and decorate your venue to bring your wedding vision to life.
services_list: Setup and teardown of decor elements
Coordination with other vendors for a seamless look

events_data.title: Bride Grooming
events_data.short_description: Get ready for your special day with our expert bride grooming services.
events_data.long_description: Our Bride Grooming package is designed to pamper and prepare you for your big day. We provide a range of beauty and grooming services to ensure you look and feel your best as you walk down the aisle. Our team of skilled professionals will work with you to create the perfect bridal look that enhances your natural beauty.

events_data.title: Food and Catering Services
events_data.short_description: Delicious catering options tailored to your event.
events_data.long_description: Our Food and Catering Services are designed to provide a culinary experience that complements your event perfectly. From mouthwatering appetizers to delectable main courses and delightful desserts, our expert culinary team will ensure that your guests are treated to a memorable dining experience.

events_data.title: Kids' Birthday Parties
events_data.short_description: Create unforgettable and fun-filled birthday parties for children.
events_data.long_description: Our Kids' Birthday Parties service is designed to bring joy and excitement to your child's special day. We specialize in planning and coordinating themed birthday parties that cater to your child's interests and preferences. From selecting the perfect theme to arranging entertainment and activities, we take care of every detail to ensure a memorable celebration for your little one.
